snippet.title: Pegasus II - On-Line systems, 1981 - Apple II
snippet.description:
A presentation of Olaf Lubeck’s second game, Pegasus II, published by Ken and Roberta Williams’ On-Line systems. 

Bits From my Personal Collection – Pegasus II, an excellent Scramble clone
https://retro365.blog/2021/04/14/bits-from-my-personal-collection-pegasus-ii-an-excellent-scramble-clone/

This video is made in conjunction with the above article on my blog and is not meant to function as a complete gameplay video but merely as a presentation of the game.

Enjoy and please remember to visit my blog at https://www.retro365.blog
